Articles.Content: Every time I land on the moon I get the ship falling into the terrain causing it to slowly blow up. This is how I land it:going 3 m/s down to the surface then falls in the terrain then the ship stops and explodes.It has a mini mechjeb case on the side that for some reason it's indestructible.

On November 19, 2017 at 8:27 PM, Rocketsciences101 said:

Every time I land on the moon I get the ship falling into the terrain causing it to slowly blow up. This is how I land it:going 3 m/s down to the surface then falls in the terrain then the ship stops and explodes.It has a mini mechjeb case on the side that for some reason it's indestructible.

Low terrain resolution settings can cause a mismatch between visible terrain and the collider, what are your settings?

Does it happen everywhere? Are you using a resized system?
